channel.title: CVE Feed for FireEye -- FireEye HXTool
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FireEye -- FireEye HXTool

item.title: CVE-2024-0318|2024-01-15T16:26:50.033Z -- FireEye -- FireEye HXTool
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting in FireEye HXTool affecting version 4.6. This vulnerability allows an attacker to store a specially crafted JavaScript payload in the 'Profile Name' and 'Hostname/IP' parameters that will be triggered when items are loaded.

item.title: CVE-2024-0319|2024-01-15T16:27:50.796Z -- FireEye -- FireEye HXTool
item.description: Open Redirect vulnerability in FireEye HXTool affecting version 4.6, the exploitation of which could allow an attacker to redirect a legitimate user to a malicious page by changing the 'redirect_uri' parameter.
